item.name: Connect to the payment links provider

header.description: Required only for Sandbox API requests; to get one, please sign up to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.qonto.com/).

request.description:
OAuth scope: `payment_link.write`

Allows your customers to start using the payment links by connecting a given bank account to the payment links provider.

response.name: The connection has been created successfully, and the customer can be redirected to complete the onboarding.

request.description:
OAuth scope: `payment_link.read`

Allows you to check the status of the connection to the payment links provider.

response.name: The connection status has been retrieved successfully.

item.name: List payments for a payment link

header.description: Required only for Sandbox API requests; to get one, please sign up to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.qonto.com/).

query.description: Page number for pagination. Must be greater than 0.
Number of records per page. Must be between 1 and 100.
Filter payments by status.
Sort payments by a field.

request.description:
OAuth scope: `payment_link.read`

Allows you to get the payments for a payment link.

response.name: The payments have been retrieved successfully.
